nchack.NCTracker¶

class nchack.NCTracker(start='')¶

A tracker/log for manipulating netcdf files

Initialize the starting file name etc

__init__(self, start='')¶

Initialize the starting file name etc

Methods

__init__(self[, start])

Initialize the starting file name etc

anomaly_annual(self[, var, baseline, silent])

Calculate annual anomalies based on a baseline period The anomoly is calculated by first calculating the climatological mean for the given baseline period.

bottom(self[, silent, cores])

Extract the bottom level from a tracker

cdo_command(self, command[, silent, cores])

Apply a cdo command to a tracker

Calculate the cell areas in square meters

A function to check if sufficient dates are available in a file or ensemble

Clip a tracker to a lon/lat box

Calculate the correlation correct between two variables in space, and for each time step

Calculate the correlation correct in time between two variables, for each grid cell

function to get the depths available in a netcdf file

Attributes

size

The size of the tracker.

start

The starting file or files of the tracker

variables

Variables contained in the tracker's netcdf file.
